subject: AI & Agents
title: The Knowledge Cutoff Problem
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Knowledge Cutoff Problem.

hook.text: Ask an LLM about yesterday's news and it has no idea. Its world stopped at the training cutoff.

buildup.text: LLMs are frozen in time â€” they only know what existed in their training data.

discovery.text: A model trained in 2023 doesn't know about events in 2024, no matter how important.

twist.text: Web search plugins and RAG help, but the base model itself remains stuck in the past.

climax.text: Users often don't realize they're talking to a snapshot, not a live oracle.

punchline.text: AI knows the past deeply and the present not at all.

quiz.question: What is the knowledge cutoff problem?
options: LLMs only know information from before their training ended
LLMs can only answer one question per session
